title: Was the Arapahoe School Shooting Stopped by an Armed School Official?
subtitle: A graphic about a 2013 school shooting in Arapahoe that was prevented by an armed school resource officer is inaccurate in some key aspects.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A December 2015 school shooting in Arapahoe County, Colorado, was circumvented by an armed school resource officer.
